item.title: Blockchain 101
item.description: Have you ever wondered how the Blockchain works? I found an interesting visual illustration about Blockchains by Anders Brownworth. Anders is a coder at Circle, a FinTech company based in the US. (via anders.com and anders.com/blockchain)

item.title: Free Online Courses on Finance and Related Topics
item.description: Are you interested in finance and financial topics? Here are some links on interesting free online courses on finance and financial topics: Open Yale Courses Yale provides two courses (ECON 252, ECON 251): ECON 252: Financial Markets (2008) ECON 252: Financial Markets (2011) ECON 251: Financial Theory, (Recommended Books) Stanford Courses Stanford University provides a course on Finance. Coursera.org Courses On Coursera there are lots of online courses.
